column1: Smoque BBQ////I can't heap enough praise on Smoque and their catering team. We hired them to cater our rehearsal dinner of 20
column2: and absolutely everything they did was awesome. Their office team was efficient and on top of all the little details
column3: and their delivery guy was quick
column5: and on time. In terms of the food
column6: how could you go wrong?! The prices were the most reasonable we found
column7: especially considering the quality of the food. The big hits for everyone were the sausage
column9: and the baked beans. We had more than enough food for everyone. Excellent all the way around!
